description.name: Morse Taper Drill Sleeve Reducing Adapter Set MT 4-3, MT 3-2, MT 2-1
description.long_desc: This reduction sleeve is a three-piece interchangeable drill sleeve set. Used to convert spindles to larger or smaller tapers and extend the spindles of drill presses, radial drills, boring mills and turret lathes.

description.name: SDS Max To SDS Plus Chuck Adaptor /metal/
description.long_desc: SDS Max To SDS Plus Chuck Adaptor. This adapter allows you to use any SDS Plus drill bits in a SDS Max rotary hammer drill. Total length 200 mm. Manufactured from Chrome-Vanadium steel. Fits all standard SDS Max Drills.
description.short_desc: SDS Max To SDS Plus Chuck Adaptor. This adapter allows you to use any SDS Plus drill bits in a SDS Max rotary hammer drill. Total length 200 mm. Manufactured from Chrome-Vanadium steel. Fits all standard SDS Max Drills.

description.name: Chuck Adaptor SDS MAX-PLUS
description.long_desc:
Adapter SDS MAX/SDS PLUS Profi for original hammers

á

Can be used in rotary hammer drills and hammers equipped with a SDS MAX drill chuck. Because of the adapter,áyou can drill or poke in concrete with accessories ended onáSDS+. Adapter made of a expertly hardened matel. For both DIY and professional use. Adapter makes your tool universal for assembly.á

á

category.name: Impact Wrenches
category.path: Pneumatics\Impact Wrenches

category_idosell.path: Pneumatics\Impact Wrenches

description.name: 1/2" Air Impact Wrench with 8-27mm Socket Set
description.long_desc:
Air Impact Wrench 1/2" with Sockets Kit. Ideal for tightening car wheel bolts, for assembly work and repairs.


Product Features



  • Air operated

  • One hand push button forward/reverse power regulator

  • 4-levels torque control for different tightening applications

  • Compatible with 1/2 inch square drive sockets

  • Twin Hammer mechanism

  • Maximum torque 310 Nm


Technical Data



  • Square Drive Size: 1/2"

  • Recommended Operating Pressure: 6,2 bar / 90 psi

  • Maximum Torque: 310 Nm

  • Air Inlet Size: 1/4"

  • Average Air Consumption: 228 L/min

  • No Load Speed: 7000 rpm

  • Sound Power Level: 103 db(A)

  • Housing Material: Steel


Package Contents:



  • Air Impact Wrench 1/2"

  • 10 pcs Chrome-Vanadium sockets: 8, 10, 11, 13, 14, 17, 19, 22, 24, 27 mm

  • 1/2" sq. drive extension bar

  • Mini oiler

  • Oil pot

  • 1/4" male nipple air
description.short_desc:

category.name: Pneumatic Ratchets
category.path: Pneumatics\Pneumatic Ratchets

category_idosell.path: Pneumatics\Pneumatic Ratchets

description.name: Pneumatic Impact Air Ratchet Wrench Kit 1/2" Drive 16pcs
description.long_desc:
Ideal tool for confined working areas such as under dashboard work and engine repair. Useful for removing and replacing automotive fasteners, replacing struts on a car, tightening down a spring compressor or popping mower blades loose.


Product Features



  • Steel angle head and lightweight aluminum body

  • Forward/reverse knob on the ratchet head

  • Ball type retainer

  • Easy speed control

  • Ergonomic grip


Technical Data



  • Size: 1/2"

  • Free Speed: 160 rpm

  • Air Pressure: 90 - 120 psi

  • Average Air Consumption: 115 L/min

  • Air Inlet: 1/4"

  • Air hose: 3/8"


Package Contents:



  • 1/2" air ratchet wrench

  • 2x 1/2" drive extension bar 3"

  • 7x 1/2" 6-point CrV sockets: 9, 10, 11, 13, 14, 17, 19mm

  • 3x 1/4" hex drive bits: PZ#2, PZ#3, PH#5

  • 1x oil pot

  • 1x mini oiler

  • 1x 1/4" air hose connector
description.short_desc:

category.name: Butt Brushes With Crimped Wire
category.path: Abrasive Materials\Brushes\Butt Brushes With Crimped Wire

category_idosell.path: Abrasive Materials\Brushes\Butt Brushes With Crimped Wire

description.name: Brass Crimped Wire Cup Brush 75mm M14
description.long_desc:
The brush with a diameter of 75 mm is made of dense, high-quality brass wire.


Perfect for renovation work, cleaning metal surfaces, removing old paint, varnishes, rust, burrs and other contaminants.


The main features of this product are:


  • M14 thread mounting, which is standard for angle grinders.

  • Made of high-quality, crimped brass wire.

  • Steel housing.

  • The maximum rotational speed is 12,500 rpm.
description.short_desc:
The brush with a diameter of 75 mm is made of dense, high-quality brass wire.

  • Steel housing.

  • The maximum rotational speed is 12,500 rpm.

category.name: Butt Brushes With Crimped Wire
category.path: Abrasive Materials\Brushes\Butt Brushes With Crimped Wire

category_idosell.path: Abrasive Materials\Brushes\Butt Brushes With Crimped Wire

description.name: Brass Crimped Wire Cup Brush 125mm/5" M14
description.long_desc:
Crimped wire cup wheels are made with brass coated steel wire for flexibility and durability. Crimped wire gives softer stroke than twisted knot brushes. Suitable for industrial derusting, cleaning, polishing, surface preparation and removing in the metal products.


Product Features



  • Suitable for use with power tools up to the maximum rated rpm

  • M14 thread for use on most angle grinder and metal polisher spindles

  • Durable steel body


Technical Data



  • Diameter: 125 mm

  • Thread: M14 x 2 mm

  • Max. speed: 6,500 rpm
description.short_desc:

description.name: Steel Twisted Knot Wire Cup Brush 100mm M14
description.long_desc:
Twisted knot wire cup wheels are made of steel. Twisted wire gives more aggression on weld splatter, heavily pitted areas, heavy rusting and old paint coatings. Ideal for aggressive cleaning of stainless steel welds, scale and surface coatings.


Product Features



  • Suitable for use with power tools up to the maximum rated rpm

  • M14 thread for use on most angle grinder and metal polisher spindles

  • Durable steel body


Technical Data



  • Diameter: 75 mm

  • Thread: M14 x 2 mm

  • Max. speed: 8,500 rpm

description.name: Bevel Twisted Knot Steel Wire Brush M14 100mm
description.long_desc:
Twisted knot bevel wire wheels are made with stainless steel. Twisted wire gives more aggression on weld splatter, heavily pitted areas, heavy rusting and old paint coatings. Ideal for aggressive cleaning of stainless steel welds, scale and surface contaminants.


Product Features



  • Suitable for use with power tools up to the maximum rated rpm

  • M14 thread for use on most angle grinders and variable speed metal finishing machines

  • Durable steel body

  • Thread: M14 x 2 mm

  • Max. speed: 12,500 rpm

description.name: Steel Twisted Knot Wire Cup Brush 75mm M14 + band
description.long_desc:
Twisted knot wire cup wheels are made with stainless steel. Twisted wire gives more aggression on weld splatter, heavily pitted areas, heavy rusting and old paint coatings. Ideal for aggressive cleaning of stainless steel welds, scale and surface coatings.


Product Features



  • The band helps to reduce wire breakage caused by flare out

  • Suitable for use with power tools up to the maximum rated rpm

  • M14 thread for use on most angle grinder and metal polisher spindles

description.name: Brass Crimped Wire Wheel Brush 100mm Shaft 6mm
description.long_desc:
Crimped wire brush wheels are made with brass coated steel wire for flexibility and durability. Ideal for final finishing of metal surfaces. Blending and finishing tool, tubes, dies, moulds, channels. Edge blending and cleaning. Surface preparation prior to painting and plating.


Product Features



  • Brass coated high resistant steel wire

  • Suitable for use with power tools up to the maximum rated rpm

  • Spindle diameter 6 mm

  • Durable steel body


Technical Data



  • Diameter: 100 mm

  • Shaft Width: 6 mm

  • Max. speed: 4,500 rpm

description.name: Steel Wire Cup Brush 65mm for Drills 6mm
description.long_desc:
The 65mm diameter brush is made of dense, hardened steel wire of the highest quality.


Perfect for renovation work, cleaning metal surfaces, removing old paint, varnishes, rust, burrs, etc.


The main features of this product are:


  • Drill mount - 6 mm diameter shank.

  • Made of hardened, high-quality steel wire with a twisted structure.

  • Steel casing.

  • The maximum rotation speed is 4,500 rpm

  • Mounted on a 6 mm spindle

  • Durable steel body

  • Diameter: 100 mm

  • Shaft Width: 6 mm

  • Max. speed: 11,000 rpm
description.short_desc:
Twisted knot bevel wire wheels are made with stainless steel. Twisted wire gives more aggression on weld splatter, heavily pitted areas, heavy rusting and old paint coatings. Ideal for aggressive cleaning of stainless steel welds, scale and surface contaminants.


Product Features



  • Suitable for use with power tools up to the maximum rated rpm

  • Mounted on a 6 mm spindle

  • Durable steel body

  • Diameter: 100 mm

  • Shaft Width: 6 mm

  • Max. speed: 11,000 rpm
